title: Dick Cheney career highlights: Key moments from the Iraq War to Trump
shortDescription: Dick Cheney, a powerful and controversial former vice president, has died. These are some of his most memorable career moments.

title: NYC voters head to the polls to pick a new mayor. Live updates.
shortDescription: Zohran Mamdani could become New York City's first Muslim mayor if he can fend off an upset bid by former Gov. Andrew Cuomo.

title: New York City voters turn out for mayoral election
shortDescription: New York City voters turned out to the polls as Zohran Mamdani and Andrew Cuomo face off in tight race.

title: VA, NJ, CA voters to offer early signs on Trump
shortDescription: Elections in New Jersey, Virginia, California and elsewhere are the first big opportunity since Trump's 2024 victory to gauge voter sentiment.

title: See how Dick Cheney shaped war, power and the White House
shortDescription: Dick Cheney, served as Vice President under George W. Bush from 2001 to 2009, and was considered one of the most powerful VPs in U.S. history.

title: Trump says he’d help ‘Dilbert' creator get access to cancer treatment
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he is 'on it' after 'Dilbert' creator Scott Adams asked for help with prostate cancer treatment. Why is he controversial?

title: Dick Cheney, powerful Republican figure turned Trump foe, dies at 84
shortDescription: Dick Cheney carved the most powerful vice president tenure in US history, playing a central role in America's hard-edged response to 9/11.

title: Trump says SNAP will be half funded in November. What does that mean?
shortDescription: When will SNAP benefits arrive for November and other things to know

title: What today's elections say about the future for MAGA and Democrats
shortDescription: The Nov. 4 races present the clearest political judgment yet of Trump's power, MAGA's fate and signs for both parties heading into future elections.

title: Trump touts GOP hopefuls in NJ, VA at Election Day eve tele-rallies
shortDescription: President Donald Trump held telephone rallies in New Jersey and Virginia to mobilize voters on the eve of the Nov. 4 election.

title: Is Election Day a federal holiday? Here's what to know.
shortDescription: Election Day 2025 is off cycle meaning it's not part of the midterms or a presidential vote but that doesn't mean it's not going to be interesting.

title: Find out which states allow same-day voter registration
shortDescription: More than 20 states allow Election Day registration if you want to vote on Tuesday, Nov. 4.

title: Are schools closed on Election Day? What to know before polls open.
shortDescription: With Election Day right around the corner, some might be wondering if schools will be closed on Tuesday, Nov. 4. Here's what you can expect.
